duties_responsibilities.duty: Properly assess risks and determine which are the most pressing versus those that can be addressed at a later time.
Analyze various aspects of an organization’s information system.
Write detailed reports as well as communicate and collaborate with other employees to find the best courses of action for each issue.
Easily create working relationships and get along well with all types of people.
Stay abreast of all IT-related discoveries and conventions and be able to learn new skills quickly.
